paper_abstract: We study the one-player game SPIRAL GALAXIES from an algorithmic viewpoint. SPIRAL GALAXIES has been shown to be NP-hard [6] more than a decade ago, but so far it seems that no one has dared exploring its algorithmic universe. We take this trip and visit some of its corners. (C) 2015 Elsevier B.V. All rights reserved.
paper_title: Towards an algorithmic guide to Spiral Galaxies
